tool_description: Get a list of free Epic Games for the week
name: Free Epic Games
title: Free Epic Games

api_list.name: Free Games
api_list.description: Get the list of free games on Epic Games for the week
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-epic-games.p.rapidapi.com/free"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-epic-games.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://free-epic-games.p.rapidapi.com/free"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-epic-games.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
